sentences: Parties convened in the morning informal group to focus on agriculture, they considered language and worked to identify shared views on aspects of food security, trade, and economic development and poverty eradication.
Facilitator Wamukoya distributed a guidance paper to facilitate the consolidation of text.
Parties expressed views on elements to consider within the proposed agriculture programme of work.
Parties agreed to work towards further streamlining text based on submissions, with input from the facilitator s guidance document and Bonn facilitator s note.
In the afternoon, parties discussed international aviation and shipping and reflected on options for text.
Some developed countries welcomed progress made by the IMO at the 62nd session of the Marine Environment Protection Committee (MEPC).
Parties will work to streamline text.
